dmca.title: You are Hosting Pirated Copies of My Husband Fritz Springmeier's Books
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Patricia Springmeier [mailto:springmp@msn.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2007 11:18 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: You are Hosting Pirated Copies of My Husband Fritz
Springmeier's Books
Importance: High

 

 

 

________________________________

From: Patricia Springmeier [mailto:springmp@msn.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2007 10:12 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: 'copywrite@theplanet.com'
Subject: You are Hosting Pirated Copies of My Husband Fritz
Springmeier's Books
Importance: High

 

Dear Legal and Copyright Departments,

 

You have no idea how difficult it has been to find the hosting company
to this person's website.  I'm a website designer and publisher (of my
husband's books), so I certainly know how to do the typical Whois domain
name search.

 

I am officially confirming that I, Patricia A. Springmeier, am
authorized by my husband, Fritz A. Springmeier to protect his
copyrights.  The following links will take you to pirated copies of my
husband's books that are hosted on your website:

 

http://www.whale.to/b/springmeier9.html

 

http://www.whale.to/b/Springmeier1991.pdf

 

http://www.whale.to/b/sp/for.html

 

http://www.whale.to/b/sp/bloodlines.html

 

http://www.whale.to/b/sp/deephtml <http://www.whale.to/b/sp/deep.html> 

 

Please respond to me as soon as possible and thank you for taking care
of this matter.

 

Patricia (Patty) Springmeier

 

303.320.1616
